message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
Your cut decreases with each round Alice, let's be realistic. This offer is still generous.
Don't get greedy, Bob. This is my last significantly generous offer.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Accept this offer and we both get something before it's too late.
Let's stop wasting time Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
